description: The Tx table index for the transaction where this script first became available.
name: txidx

description: The type of the script. This is currenttly either 'timelock' or 'plutus'.
name: type

description: JSON representation of the timelock script, null for other script types
name: json

description: CBOR encoded plutus script data, null for other script types
name: bytes

description: The size of the CBOR serialised script, if it is a Plutus script.
name: serialised_size
